thread.title: Listen to Mastodon’s New Song “Show Yourself”
thread.title_full: Listen to Mastodon’s New Song “Show Yourself”

author: Noah Yoo
title: Listen to Mastodon’s New Song “Show Yourself”
text:
Mastodon Photo by Paul R. Giunta/Getty Images 
Mastodon have shared a new song, “Show Yourself.” It’s the second track the band has released from their upcoming album Emperor of Sand , which is out March 31 via Reprise. Listen to it below. The band previously shared the song “ Sultan’s Curse ” alongside the album announcement. Their last full-length, Once More ‘Round the Sun , was released in 2014. Artists In This Story
